summary: Buff to the Staff of Magnus so that it's actually useful after completing the Mage Questline
descriptionHtml:
Lets be honest. We all went upon an epic quest to aquire the fabled and powerful Staff of Magnus!

Just to realise after aquiring it - the staff was garbage. Used only to finish the Mage quest, and then thrown into the chest in Arch Mages quarters.
This Mod replaces the old Staff of Magnus spell effect with a new, more powerful one, to make this a truly legendary stave to be feared!
Effect: Absorbs 50 Health and Magika from the target - Powerful, but not brokenly OP.

Warning** If at any point during the mage quest, this staff stops interacting with game objects, such as the eye of magnus ward - disable the mod, unequip/reequip your staff, and you should be able to finish your quest.
author: illusion466

files.name: Staff of Magnus Buffed w- Soul Trap
